# standardDeviation

**Instance Property**

The standard deviation of the distribution of values used to calculate the average.

## Declaration

```swift
var standardDeviation: Double { get }
```

## Reading the data

- **averageMeasurement**: The value of the average.
- **sampleCount**: The number of samples used to calculate the average.

items.description: The number of samples used to calculate the average.
